name: Airthings
0:
”Alexa, open airthings.”
”Alexa, ask airthings to list my rooms.”
”Alexa, ask airthings to check radon.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: airthings
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Airthings offers a skill for accessing your Airthings device’s sensor values with Amazon Alexa’s voice controls.

You can ask Alexa to read aloud sensor values from devices you have added in the Airthings App that are online via a Hub or View product. An Airthings device and a registered Airthings account is required before activating the Alexa skill.

You can also opt to add an Airthings device as an Alexa smart home device, but for now, only the temperature sensor is supported by Amazon.
